member.summary: Represents an ordered set of historical revsions to a database (file).

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DatabaseHistory class.

member.name: M:LeastViable.Data.Impl.FreakazoidMapper.Migrations.DatabaseHistory.PerformSchemaUpgrade(LeastViable.Common.Fascades.AdoNet.UoW.IUnitOfWork)
member.summary: For a given unitOfWork, perform a schema upgrade if necessary. The ordered set of revisions are executed from version+1 to version[n].
member.returns: A value indicating whether any changes were needed against the target database (file).

member.summary: Gets a list of ordered revisions.

member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL required to determine if schema tracking is enabled in the database (file).

member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL required to determine the schema version of the database (file).

member.name: P:LeastViable.Data.Impl.FreakazoidMapper.Migrations.DatabaseHistory.IncrementSchemaVersionCommandText
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL required to increment the schema version in the database (file).
